SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountIDNotRecognisedException
Thrown when attempting to use an account ID that does not exit in the system.
BadMiniSocialMedia
BadMiniSocialMedia is a minimally compiling, but non-functioning implementor of the MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface.
BadSocialMedia
BadSocialMedia is a minimally compiling, but non-functioning implementor of the SocialMediaPlatform interface.
BasePost
BasePost is an abstract class used to construct the classes of Post, Comment and Endorsement.
Comment
Comment is a class that inherits the Endorsement class (the capabilities to store an original ID), as well as implementing the Interactable interface, allowing it to be commented and endorsed.
Endorsement
Endorsement is a class that simply inherits BasePost, while adding capabilities for an original post ID, allowing us to use filter operations to relate it to an original Post or Comment.
HandleNotRecognisedException
Thrown when attempting to use an account handle that does not exit in the system.
IllegalHandleException
Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle already in use in the system.
Interactable
Interactable is an interface that sets the groundwork for the functionality to receive Comments and Endorsements.
InvalidHandleException
Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle empty or having more than the system limit of characters.
InvalidPostException
Thrown when attempting to create a post which the message is empty or has more characters than the system's limit.
MiniSocialMediaPlatform
MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface.
NotActionablePostException
Thrown when attempting to act upon an not-actionable post.
Post
Post is a class that inherits BasePost and implements the interface of Interactable, allowing it to store comment and endorsmeent information.
PostIDNotRecognisedException
Thrown when attempting to use a post ID that does not exit in the system.
SocialMedia
 
SocialMediaPlatform
SocialMediaPlatform interface.
SocialMediaPlatformTestApp
A short program to illustrate an app testing some minimal functionality of a concrete implementation of the SocialMediaPlatform interface -- note you will want to increase these checks, and run it on your SocialMedia class (not the BadSocialMedia class).
User
